verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2317>Hadrach,<s%> and <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> shall be the <S%H4496>rest<s%> thereof: <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> as of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall be toward the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H1379>border<s%> thereby; <S%H6865>Tyrus,<s%> and <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> it be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2449>wise.<s%>

And <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%> did <S%H1129>build<s%> herself a <S%H4692>stronghold,<s%> and heaped <S%H6651>up<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and fine <S%H2742>gold<s%> as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will cast her <S%H3423>out,<s%> and he will <S%H5221>smite<s%> her <S%H2428>power<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H3372>fear;<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> also shall see it, and be very <S%H3966>sorrowful,<s%> <S%H2342><s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> her <S%H4007>expectation<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from <S%H4480>Gaza,<s%> <S%H5804><s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>
And a <S%H4464>bastard<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> out of his <S%H4480>mouth,<s%> <S%H6310><s%> and his <S%H8251>abominations<s%> from <S%H4480>between<s%> <S%H996><s%> his <S%H8127>teeth:<s%> but he that <S%H7604>remaineth,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> shall be for our <S%H430>God,<s%> and he shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as a <S%H441>governor<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> as a <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

And I will <S%H2583>encamp<s%> about mine <S%H1004>house<s%> because of the <S%H4675>army,<s%> because of him that passeth <S%H4480>by,<s%> <S%H5674><s%> and because of him that <S%H4480>returneth:<s%> <S%H7725><s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>through<s%> them any <S%H5750>more:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> with mine <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Rejoice <S%H1523><s%> <S%H3966>greatly,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> <S%H7321>shout,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> thy <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> unto thee: <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H6662>just,<s%> and having <S%H3467>salvation;<s%> <S%H6041>lowly,<s%> and <S%H7392>riding<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> an <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H5895>colt<s%> the <S%H1121>foal<s%> of an <S%H860>ass.<s%>

And I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> from <S%H4480>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H669><s%> and the <S%H5483>horse<s%> from <S%H4480>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3389><s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off:<s%> and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> unto the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> and his <S%H4915>dominion<s%> shall be from <S%H4480>sea<s%> <S%H3220><s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and from the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5104><s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

As for <S%H859>thee<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> by the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%> I have sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> thy <S%H615>prisoners<s%> out of the <S%H4480>pit<s%> <S%H953><s%> wherein is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Turn <S%H7725><s%> you to the <S%H1225>stronghold,<s%> ye <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of <S%H8615>hope:<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> do I <S%H5046>declare<s%> that I will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> unto thee;

When <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> for me, <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> with <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H5782>raised<s%> up thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> O <S%H3120>Greece,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> thee as the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of a mighty <S%H1368>man.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and his <S%H2671>arrow<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as the <S%H1300>lightning:<s%> and the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and shall <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H5591>whirlwinds<s%> of the <S%H8486>south.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H1598>defend<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them; and they shall <S%H398>devour,<s%> and <S%H3533>subdue<s%> with <S%H7050>slingstones;<s%> <S%H68><s%> and they shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and make a <S%H1993>noise<s%> as <S%H3644>through<s%> <S%H3196>wine;<s%> and they shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> like <S%H4219>bowls,<s%> and as the <S%H2106>corners<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H3467>save<s%> them in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of his <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they shall be as the <S%H68>stones<s%> of a <S%H5145>crown,<s%> lifted up as an <S%H5264>ensign<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H127>land.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> great is his <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> and <S%H4100>how<s%> great is his <S%H3308>beauty!<s%> <S%H1715>corn<s%> shall make the young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5107>cheerful,<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine<s%> the <S%H1330>maids.<s%>
